update WF_COMP_WD_CARDS
COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ARCHIVE_ID = #{archiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CARD_NUMBER = #{cardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

IA = #{ia,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IA_ACR = #{iaAcr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where CARD_ID = #{cardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update WF_COMP_WD_CARDS set COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ARCHIVE_ID = #{archiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARD_NUMBER = #{cardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IA = #{ia,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IA_ACR = #{iaAcr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where CARD_ID = #{cardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
